title: Wallys Natural Products Aromatherapy Blend - Organic - Roll-On - Essential Oils - Balance - .33 oz
description: Dont let your time of the month throw you out of sync. Take the edge off with Wallys Natural Balance Aromatherapy. Find the state of balance your body seeks with the comforting blend of organic Geranium, Lavender and Clary Sage essential oils. Made with a convenient to use rollerball applicator, this unique essential oil blend is easy to use. When needed simply roll over your abdomen, chest or neck to keep you in natural balance throughout your day. Use Wallys Natural Organic Balance Aromatherapy on the go or when you have a free moment to yourself. Country of Origin: USA Weight (lbs): 0.10 Organic: 95%+ Organic
